amendment.description: An amendment numbered 38 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to prohibit funds from being used to propose, plan, or execute a new round of Base Realignment and Closure (BRAC).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 38 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to prohibit funds from being used to propose, plan, or execute a new round of Base Realignment and Closure (BRAC).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ratcliffe amendment (A069) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ratcliffe amendment (A069) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A069) offered by Mr. Ratcliffe.
